name: @oliverphaser/nativescript-bitmap-factory
description: A NativeScript module for creating and manipulating bitmap images. Forked from mkloubert and updated for NativeScript 8 with fixed iOS crop bug.

scripts.build: npm run tsc && npm run build.native
scripts.test.android: npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && ns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && ns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.demo.ios: npm i && cd ../demo && ns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm i && cd ../demo && ns run android
scripts.demo.reset: cd ../demo && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo && ns plugin remove @oliverphaser/nativescript-bitmap-factory && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: npm run demo.reset && npx rimraf -- node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
